title: Mandates that school textbooks be authored by current or former teachers and that the state supervise the printing of such books
summary: Mandates that school textbooks be authored by current or former teachers and that the state supervise the printing of such books.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing the "New York state authoring and printing textbooks law" to require the state to mandate that school textbooks be authored by current or former teachers and that the state supervise the printing of such textbooks
